original: unfold PropositionalStable. intros L minL pL mL. intros x y Hx Hy. unfold MonoPred_stableSM in pL. unfold Bisimulation in R1_bis. destruct R1_bis as [bis_l bis_r]. specialize (bis_l L minL pL x y Hx). specialize (bis_r L minL pL x y Hy). destruct bis_l as [m' [Rm' [nm' bis_m']]]. destruct bis_r as [n' [Rn' [yn' bis_n']]]. exists n'. split. auto. auto.
